General.Name: Nations Technologies Inc
General.Description: Nations Technologies Inc. provides integrated circuit (IC) products and services in China. It offers cyber security authentication, smart card, trusted computing, low-power consumption Bluetooth, and contactless IC. The company also provides MCU, RCC, and mobile security innovation products, as well as corresponding solutions. In addition, it offers ID2, IoT authentication, OBU, and LoRa IoT solutions. The company was formerly known as Nationz Technologies Inc. and changed its name to Nations Technologies Inc. in May 2019. Nations Technologies Inc. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
